scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run typechain
scripts.typechain: npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat typechain
scripts.deploy:ganache: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network ganache scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:ganachelocal: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network localhost scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:testnet: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network ropsten scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy.js
